summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6039 for the improvement of 36th Avenue Northeast from East 65th Street to approximately 320 feet north thereof; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 82062, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
